faq.question: Item Restoration
faq.answer: if a character's item has disappeared, please submit the exact name of the item and the approximate time of disappearance, and submit the report through the 1:1 petition service. The GM will investigate the matter and decide on its restoration. Please understand that restoration might be difficult in certain situations.

faq.question: Character Restore Related
faq.answer: If a character has died or lost EXP due to a bug or system error, restoration may take place after the related information has been examined. Deaths caused by lag or abnormal disconnections, or the EXP losses caused by topographical issues and normal system operation are not considered for restoration.
